channel.title: Personal on Dean Hiran
channel.description: Recent content in Personal on Dean Hiran

item.title: Hello World?
item.description:
Hey! It’s me, Dean. Welp, here we are. This is my (almost) selfhosted blog/portfolio/git server for my stuff. I will probably post anything here that I think is interesting.

This site is mostly inspired by my great friend nixwiz and you should check him out. He is way smarter than me and even has an ssh server located on his awesome (truly) selfhosted website.

Photo by Pawel Czerwinski on Unsplash
